Employee List

First Name Last Name Email Id Actions
{{ employee.firstName }} {{ employee.lastName }} {{ employee.emailId }}
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from '../employee'; import {EmployeeService} from '../employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-list', templateUrl: './employee-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-list.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeListComponent implements OnInit{ employees: Employee[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.getEmployees(); } constructor(private employeesService:EmployeeService){ } getEmployees(){ this.employeesService.getEmployeesList().subscribe(data => { this.employees =data; }) } }
